snippet: After early struggles with holding on to the ball, the Giants switched running back David Wilson to a kick returner. But with injuries to the top two backs, he is front and center again at running back.
abstract: New York Giants, with running backs Andre Brown and Ahmad Bradshaw injured, are expected to turn rookie running back David Wilson, who has been used more as a kick-return specialist than as a running back.
lead_paragraph: After early struggles with holding on to the ball, the Giants switched running back David Wilson to a kick returner. But with injuries to the top two backs, he is front and center again at running back.

headline.seo: Showing Tireless Speed, Giants’ David Wilson Gets a Second Shot
headline.main: Showing Tireless Speed, Giants Rookie Gets Second Shot
headline.print_headline: Showing Tireless Speed, Giants Rookie Gets Second Shot
